players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "Charlie's death is a huge blow to our town. We need to figure out who did this and make sure they don't strike again."
You: "I believe the mafia is still among us. We need to be cautious and gather more information before making any accusations."
You: "I will keep a low profile and observe the interactions between players. This way, I can gather more clues about who might be on the mafia side."
Bob: "Let's focus on gathering more information and not jump to conclusions. We need to work together to uncover the truth."
